meanings.definition: The state or quality of being a son.
meanings.sent1: His sonhood brought him joy and responsibility.
meanings.sent2: The bond of sonhood is special and unique.
meanings.sent3: His mischievous sonhood always keeps the family entertained.
meanings.sent4: The weight of sonhood on his shoulders felt heavier each day.
meanings.sent5: The essence of sonhood is a blend of love and growth.

meanings.definition: The relationship between a son and his parents.
meanings.sent1: Their sonhood was filled with laughter and shared memories.
meanings.sent2: The strength of sonhood can overcome any challenge.
meanings.sent3: Their playful sonhood often led to fun family adventures.
meanings.sent4: The bridge of sonhood connects generations with love.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of sonhood lies in its unconditional bond.
